start.description: You glance at your surroundings, the smell of damp earth fills your nostrils. You are in a dark cave. You have no memory of how you got here. You see a lit doorway.

shrine.description: As you enter the room, you notice you are in a shrine. There are lit candles and a statue of what appears to be a god of death. You notice a glowing orb on the altar.

orb.description: A glowing orb that seems to be pulsating with energy.
